AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Imperial Cult priest
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always rather skilled at aiding the woes and maledictions of those in need. It seemed only logical to [PAWN_nameDef] that [PAWN_pronoun] should put [PAWN_possessive] skills to work... just not for the local temple.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Imperial Cult acolyte
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Disillusioned with the local temple, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to lend [PAWN_possessive] hands elsewhere. While most locals scorn the Imperial Cult, [PAWN_nameDef] figured [PAWN_pronoun] would give them a chance.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Imperial Cult disciple
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a reasonably high ranking member of the Imperial Cult, [PAWN_nameDef] was given a fair number of benefits. [PAWN_nameDef] also had to endure the harsh words of those [PAWN_pronoun] once called friends, a few of which once considered [PAWN_objective] family.
